Articles.Content: how do i access my craft files in ksp. i am on a macbook air using osx 10.8.5 and i am using ksp from steam. thx

The saves may be in the "Kerbal Space Program/saves" folder, right click on KSP in the Steam client and click Properties, then Local Files, there will be a button to open the game folder.

If they are not there then they are likely in a hidden user folder, the best way to find that would be to do a folder search with hidden folders enabled, looking for your save file name.
